shells_town.name: Shells Town
shells_town.description: A Marine base town where justice and corruption intertwine.
shells_town.story_description: Begin your journey as a Marine recruit under the corrupt Captain Morgan. Witness the darkness within the ranks of justice and decide whether to remain loyal to the system or forge your own path of righteousness.

key_npcs.name: Captain Morgan
key_npcs.description: A tyrannical Marine captain with an axe for a hand

key_npcs.name: Koby
key_npcs.description: A kind-hearted boy aspiring to become a Marine Admiral

key_npcs.name: Helmeppo
key_npcs.description: Spoiled son of Captain Morgan who abuses his father's power

shells_town.lore: Shells Town is home to the 153rd Branch of the Marines, where young recruits come to begin their service to justice. However, under Captain Morgan's rule, the town has become a place of fear and oppression. The townspeople live in terror of the corrupt Marine officers, creating a perfect backdrop for questioning what true justice means.

syrup_village.name: Syrup Village
syrup_village.description: A peaceful village known for tall tales and the legacy of a brave warrior.
syrup_village.story_description: Inspired by Usopp's legendary tales of adventure, you start your journey in this quiet village. When pirates threaten the peace, you must decide whether to stand and fight or flee to safety, all while seeking a ship and crew to begin your own grand adventure.

key_npcs.name: Usopp
key_npcs.description: A young man known for his tall tales and incredible marksmanship

key_npcs.name: Kaya
key_npcs.description: A kind but sickly girl who owns a large mansion

key_npcs.name: Captain Kuro
key_npcs.description: A former pirate captain plotting in the shadows

syrup_village.lore: Syrup Village is a small, peaceful community where the biggest excitement usually comes from Usopp's wild stories of adventure and pirates. The village represents the quiet life that many dream of protecting, making it a perfect starting point for those who wish to become protectors of the innocent or adventurers inspired by tales of the sea.

ohara.name: Ohara
ohara.description: The destroyed island of scholars, keeper of forbidden knowledge.
ohara.story_description: As a survivor of the Buster Call that destroyed Ohara, you carry the burden of forbidden knowledge. The World Government's atrocity has opened your eyes to the corruption of the system, drawing you toward the Revolutionary Army's cause of bringing down the oppressive regime.

key_npcs.name: Dr. Clover
key_npcs.description: The ghost of the head archaeologist who died protecting knowledge

key_npcs.name: Nico Robin
key_npcs.description: The only other known survivor of Ohara's destruction

key_npcs.name: Jaguar D. Saul
key_npcs.description: A Marine giant who questioned the World Government's actions

ohara.lore: Ohara was once the world's greatest center of learning, home to scholars who sought to uncover the true history of the world. The World Government destroyed the island with a Buster Call to prevent the truth from spreading. Survivors of this tragedy carry both incredible knowledge and deep hatred for the system that committed this atrocity.

baratie.name: Baratie
baratie.description: The famous floating restaurant where fighting and cooking unite.
baratie.story_title: A Taste of the Grand Line
baratie.story_description: Train as both a cook and fighter at the world-famous floating restaurant Baratie. Learn that feeding people and protecting them are equally important arts. Under the guidance of Red-Leg Zeff, discover the true meaning of hospitality and strength.

key_npcs.name: Red-Leg Zeff
key_npcs.description: Former pirate captain turned master chef with legendary kicking techniques

key_npcs.name: Sanji
key_npcs.description: A passionate cook who never wastes food and fights with his legs

key_npcs.name: Patty
key_npcs.description: One of the fighting cooks who protects the restaurant

initial_quests: A Taste of the Grand Line
baratie.lore: Baratie is a floating restaurant in the middle of the ocean, founded by Red-Leg Zeff, a former pirate. The restaurant serves anyone who can pay, regardless of whether they're pirates, Marines, or civilians. The cooks are all trained fighters who protect their establishment and uphold the belief that no one should go hungry.

loguetown.name: Loguetown
loguetown.description: Where the Pirate King died and where dreams begin.
loguetown.story_description: In the town where Gold Roger was executed and the Great Age of Pirates began, you must choose your path. Will you follow in his footsteps seeking One Piece, uphold justice as a Marine, fight for revolution, or forge an entirely new destiny?

key_npcs.name: Captain Smoker
key_npcs.description: A Marine captain who has never let a pirate escape

key_npcs.name: Tashigi
key_npcs.description: A sword-collecting Marine who believes in justice

key_npcs.name: Bartolomeo
key_npcs.description: A troublemaker who idolizes certain pirates

loguetown.lore: Loguetown is known as the 'Town of the Beginning and the End' because it's where Gol D. Roger was born and executed. His final words sparked the Great Age of Pirates, making this town a symbol of dreams and adventure. Many aspiring pirates visit the execution platform before entering the Grand Line.

skypiea.name: Skypiea
skypiea.description: A mystical island floating high above the clouds.
skypiea.story_description: Born on a sky island 10,000 meters above the sea, you must navigate the ancient conflicts between Skypieans and Shandians while exploring the mysteries of the sky people. The Upper Yard holds many secrets, and the sacred Vearth carries the weight of history.

key_npcs.name: Gan Fall
key_npcs.description: The previous God of Skypiea who rides a bird named Pierre

key_npcs.name: Wyper
key_npcs.description: A fierce warrior fighting to reclaim his ancestor's land

key_npcs.name: Conis
key_npcs.description: A kind sky islander who plays the harp

skypiea.lore: Skypiea is a sky island located 10,000 meters above Jaya. The Skypieans are a peaceful people who worship Vearth (earth/soil) as it's extremely rare in the sky. They have been in conflict with the Shandians over the Upper Yard for 400 years, stemming from a misunderstanding about the sacred land.

elbaf.name: Elbaf
elbaf.description: The legendary island of giants and mighty warriors.
elbaf.story_description: Born among the giants of Elbaf, the strongest country in the world, you must prove yourself worthy in trials of honor and combat. Only by mastering the ways of the warrior and understanding the giant's code of honor can you leave your homeland to sail the lower seas.

key_npcs.name: Dorry
key_npcs.description: One of two legendary giant captains locked in eternal combat

key_npcs.name: Brogy
key_npcs.description: The other legendary giant captain, Dorry's rival and friend

key_npcs.name: Elder Giant
key_npcs.description: An ancient giant who remembers the old ways

elbaf.lore: Elbaf is known as the strongest country in the world, home to a proud race of giants. The giants follow a warrior culture where honor is more important than life itself. Many giants become famous pirates or Marines, respected for their strength and noble nature. The island is filled with massive trees and ancient traditions.
